Content: I have an 83 cb650 nighthawk that was given to me by my great grandad. The bike was sitting for close to 30 years but I completely restored it. The engine runs and idles fine but the issue Iâ€™m having is it wonâ€™t go when I put it into gear, it will rev up in gear but wonâ€™t move. Iâ€™ve replaced the clutch disc and springs, rebuilt the slave cylinder with a kit from online, new master cylinders, & new brake and clutch hoses but still nothing. I even made sure the neutral position sensor was good which it was. The shaft spins when I rotate the wheel in neutral as well. At this point Iâ€™m generally lost but donâ€™t have the money to take to a shop, I do have car knowledge because thatâ€™s what I generally work on. Any suggestions?
